{{evento.eventoId}} {{evento.imagemURL}} {{evento.tema}} {{evento.local}} {{evento.dataEvento}} {{evento.eventoId}} {{evento.eventoId}} {{evento.eventoId}}
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import {HttpClient} from "@angular/common/http" @Component({ selector: 'app-Eventos', templateUrl: './Eventos.component.html', styleUrls: ['./Eventos.component.scss'] }) export class EventosComponent implements OnInit { public eventos: any; constructor( private http: HttpClient) { } ngOnInit() { this.getEventos(); } public getEventos() : void { this.http.get('https://localhost:5001/api/Eventos').subscribe( response => this.eventos = response, error => console.error(error) ); } }
